channel.title: Subramanian, U. on Harish Guda
channel.description: Recent content in Subramanian, U. on Harish Guda

item.title: Your Uber Is Arriving: Managing On-Demand Workers Through Surge Pricing, Forecast Communication, and Worker Incentives
item.description: We study how an on-demand service platform can coordinate its workforce through forecast-sharing, worker bonuses and surge pricing in a geographically dispersed marketplace using gig-economy workers.
